title: Native Windows Recorder in Katalon Studio
description: From version 7.0.0, Katalon supports the recording utility for   Desktop apps testing. From version 7.5.0, Native   Windows Recorder is available for Windows machines. This   new-generation Windows Recorder gives you a seamless recording   experience that is similar to Web Recorder.

frontMatter.title: Native Windows Recorder in Katalon Studio
